member.name: M:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.UIInteractive.Refactorings.RefactoringsUI.RefactoringWizardForm.InitControls_LoadSaveLocationSettings(JetBrains.Lifetimes.Lifetime,System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window,JetBrains.Application.Settings.ISettingsStore)
member.summary: Persists window position. The idea is: (1) The position is relative to the owner window (main window, or tab well if floating). (2) The position is of the title bar center (top-center point of the window), because the window width/height depends on the refactoring control.
